##link map, library(sf), merge with data

```{r}
linkMap="https://github.com/Data-Visual-Masters/Deliverable3/raw/main/Washington_State_Public_Schools.geojson"

library(sf)
```
```{r}
schoolsmap=read_sf(linkMap)
```

```{r}
head(schoolsmap)
```
```{r}
schoolsmap_indexes=merge(schoolsmap, schooldata)
```

##Call ggplot2 to create base map, add data layer, customize colors
```{r}
library(ggplot2)

baseMap= ggplot(data=schoolsmap) + theme_classic() + geom_sf(fill = 'grey', color=NA)

baseMap
```
